title: Wondershare MirrorGo 1.5.0.63 Multilingual + Serial
description:
Wondershare MirrorGo 1.5.0.63 Multilingual + Serial [4realtorrentz]


Wondershare MirrorGo - a powerful tool for mirroring display Android on your PC. The program performs many more functions than the output of the phone screen on a PC monitor. It is specially optimized for gamers. Use your mouse and keyboard, you can play games for Android in HD-format on your PC, keeping game stats on the PC and on Android. You can easily record the process of the game and take pictures of the screen using MirrorGo. And of course, the transfer of files between the mobile device and the computer has not been so easy - just drag and copy.

MirrorGo - a useful application to display Android on your PC in real time. Significantly expands the capabilities of mobile devices through the use of computer facilities, performing many more functions than just concluded the phone screen on a PC monitor. Now you can take part in games for Android in HD-format on your computer. MirrorGo allows you to easily record the process of the game and to make screen shots, save all the statistics. And of course, the transfer of files between the mobile device and the computer has not been so easy - just drag and copy.

Benefits and features:

- Ability to view the screen of the mobile device to the PC in real time.
- Traditional emulators do not synchronize with the phone.
- Synchronization and save game data, play your favorite game in any place!
- Big games and big steps have to be on the big screen.
- View in HD, a full range of screen.
- More freedom with the use of mouse and keyboard PC.
- make screenshots.
- Record video.
- Acceptance / rejection, sending SMS.
- Faster Game + = better conversions another victory.
- Eliminate eye fatigue - play longer!
- Eliminate the deformation of the big toe.
- Supports transmission APK files that are automatically installed.

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Use given details to register/Sign in
3. Done
